title: Guide to the Crystal Gems - Rebecca Sugar
description:
This is the book provided by Rebecca Sugar and Cartoon Network Books, "Guide to the Crystal Gems"
Special Thanks for "THE WORLD OF STEVEN UNIVERSE" for providing the content.

Description:
The Crystal Gemsâ€”Garnet, Amethyst, and Pearlâ€”are three of the toughest heroes on Earth. They are also mentors to Steven Universe, a Gem/human hybrid boy whose mother was a great Gem leader. This guide, told from Steven's point-of-view and written by the show's very own creator, Rebecca Sugar, is packed with facts about the Crystal Gems' powers, abilities, and origins, It also includes original art and a special introduction from Rebecca Sugar. This book is a must-have for any Steven Universe fan!
